imdb.title: Yuru Camp
imdb.plot: Nadeshiko, a high school student who had moved from Shizuoka to Yamanashi, decides to see the famous, 1000 yen-bill-featured Mount Fuji. Even though she manages to bike all the way to Motosu, she's forced to turn back because of w...

episodes.title: Curry Noodles Are the Best Travel Companion
episodes.plot: The end of the year is approaching. Rin plans a solo camping trip while the members of the Outdoor Activities Club earn cash to buy more gear.

episodes.title: New Year's Solo Camper Girl
episodes.plot: It's New Year's Eve. Rin arrives at the shore in Shizuoka. Nadeshiko is busy with her temp job when she receives a message from Rin.

episodes.title: Surprise Camping and Some Deep Thoughts
episodes.plot: Nadeshiko is spending New Years at her grandma's place in Shizuoka. Her childhood friend Ayano is staying over, and Rin joins them to hang out.

episodes.title: What Are You Buying With Your Temp Job Money?
episodes.plot: After the winter vacation, the members of Outdoor Activities Club talk about the next camp.

episodes.title: Caribou-kun and Lake Yamanaka
episodes.plot: Chiaki, Aoi and Ena set up camp at Lake Yamanaka.

episodes.title: Cape Ohmama in Winter
episodes.plot: Chiaki, Aoi and Ena relax at the cape with a nice view. However, as the sun goes down, it gets colder and it's no place for camping.

episodes.title: Nadeshiko's Solo Camp Planning
episodes.plot: Nadeshiko is going on her first solo camp. Meanwhile, Rin is visiting Hayakawa for sightseeing and happens to see Sakura.

episodes.title: Camping Alone
episodes.plot: After arriving at the campsite, Nadeshiko begins experimenting with outdoor cooking. While she is preparing a bonfire and making foil-grilled vegetables, two small campers come to visit.

episodes.title: Winter's End and the Day of Departure
episodes.plot: Everyone plans for a camping trip to Izu. Later, Rin's grandfather comes over for a visit and helps Rin with her moped.

episodes.title: The Izu Camp Trip Begins!
episodes.plot: Akari joins the Outdoor Activities Club members as they leave for Izu. They sample local gourmet foods and visit geospots, but discover that they can't use the campsite they had planned to camp at.

episodes.title: Izu Camping!! On the Way
episodes.plot: The Outdoor Activities Club members change their schedule and head to the alternate campsite. They soak in the hot springs on the way, which refreshes the mind and body. At night, they enjoy the homemade camping meal of Nadeshiko and Aoi.

episodes.title: Izu Camping!!! Birthdays!
episodes.plot: It's the second day of the Izu trip. The girls enjoy sightseeing in Izu at the Tombolo on Sehama Beach, and in Dogashima Park. Later, Rin, Chiaki and Ena prepare Nadeshiko's and Aoi's birthday surprise.

episodes.title: We're Home
episodes.plot: It's the last day of the Izu trip. After greeting Mr. Iida, the girls climb Mt. Omuro, and go to the zoo to see the capybaras in their hot spring.

episodes.title: Special: Mystery Camp
episodes.plot: Inuko introduces stories of unusual camping.

episodes.title: Special: Traveling Shima Rin
episodes.plot: Ena imagines that when the American expedition arrives at Mars, they find Shima Rin there camping.

episodes.title: Mount Fuji and Curry Noodles
episodes.plot: A girl named Rin Shima comes to a campsite in Lake Motosu, facing opposite Mount Fuji, to spend the day camping. While setting up a campfire, Rin notices a peculiar girl sleeping by the public restroom.

episodes.title: Welcome to the Outdoor Activities Club!
episodes.plot: Nadeshiko pays a visit to her school's Outdoor Activities Club, consisting of two members; Aoi Inuyama and Chiaki Ohgaki.

episodes.title: Mount Fuji and Relaxed Hot Pot Camp
episodes.plot: While Nadeshiko makes gyoza hotpot for Rin, Chiaki gets a job at a liquor store to fund the club.

episodes.title: The Outdoor Activities Club and the Solo Camping Girl
episodes.plot: While planning for their first camping trip together, the Outdoor Activities Club experiments with cost-effective ways to make their sleeping bags more effective in cold weather. Meanwhile, Rin gets her motorcycle license and goes on a solo camping trip in Nagano.

episodes.title: Two Camps, Two Campers' Views
episodes.plot: Nadeshiko's group takes a nice relaxing dip in the hot springs before they reach their campsite. Meanwhile, Rin arrives at the Takabotchi Highlands and is overcome by a desire to go to a hot spring too.

episodes.title: Meat and Fall Colors and the Mystery Lake
episodes.plot: Rin opens a package to find a mini-grill, which she dreams of using to cook various meats while talking with Ena. Nadeshiko overhears their conversation and suggests a camping trip to try the grill.

episodes.title: A Night on the Lake Shore and Campers
episodes.plot: At Lake Shibire, Rin and Nadeshiko set up their tents as the latter worries about the myth of a ghost in the lake.

episodes.title: Exams, Caribou, Steamed Buns, Yum!
episodes.plot: Chiaki shows off a wooden bowl and skillet set to Aoi, which she learns must have the lacquer finish removed in order to place hot food inside and be seasoned, respectively. As they work on this, Ena visits and the three talk about their new substitute teacher and camping after exams.

episodes.title: A Night of Navigator Nadeshiko and Hot Spring Steam
episodes.plot: Nadeshiko plans to go camping with Rin, but catches a cold the night before and has to stay at home.

episodes.title: Clumsy Travelers and Camp Meetings
episodes.plot: Rin oversleeps and is rushing to her campsite when she encounters a roadblock. Upon being told by Chiaki that it may have been left there and never moved, she proceeds and reaches the site, where she struggles to set up due to the windy conditions.

episodes.title: Christmas Camp!
episodes.plot: Chiaki and Aoi check in at the Asagiri Plateau campsite while Toba sets up her grill and starts drinking. While the two eat at a nearby restaurant, Rin prepares her tent and Nadeshiko shows up shortly after.

episodes.title: Mount Fuji and the Laid-Back Camp Girls
episodes.plot: Nadeshiko tells the group what she expects them to be like in ten years when Rin returns. After bathing, the campers enjoy various movies and shows on a tablet Chiaki had brought along until they decide to call it a night. Under the stars, Rin and Nadeshiko talk about their plans for the new year before going to sleep.

episodes.title: Special: Heya Camp
episodes.plot: A short story that takes place before Nadeshiko joins the Outdoor Activities Club.

episodes.title: OVA: Tall Tale Camp
episodes.plot: While Nadeshiko is reading a magazine, Chiaki and Aoi discuss camping customs in other countries. Aoi briefly leaves before coming back, but catches Nadeshiko's suspicion as she is smaller.

episodes.title: OVA: Survival Camp
episodes.plot: During a plane flight to Australia, turbulence causes Chiaki to panic and jump out with her friends in tow, with the five parachuting onto a deserted island.
